the presence of a shadow, indicating the possibility of a tumor on your lung. An exploratory operation is recommended.
The doctors operate and find a fast-spreading cancer. The lung is removed, but complications from the operation cause you difficulty. You die on the operating room table. This game is over.

The doctor checks your heart and blood circulation. He would like to have you admitted to the hospital for tests.  Once in the hospital, the tests show
that you are diabetic. You will have to watch your diet very carefully and take special medication.
It is very important that you follow the doctor's directions to the letter. At your age, diabetics can easily develop circulatory problems and suffer many adverse effects from this disease.
that you are suffering from some minor circulatory problems caused by old age. You are given some medication which helps a little.
While walking outside one day, you feel a numbness in your left hand and shoulder. Suddenly, your whole body feels a cold stab of pain. You suffer a major stroke and die. This game is over.
